name: Hungry Frog (itch) (Mitchell Todd)
description:
HUNGRY FROG

The Swamp is scarce and the food supply has ran completely empty, the flies have left in search of new places to feed and you are left hungry... Explore new lands in search for the King Fly to feed your Hungry Frog. Keep an eye out for things that may prevent Hungry Frog from discovering where the flies went, dodge the oncoming traffic and race across 10 levels of varying difficulty. Can you make it to the end and feed your Hungry Frog?

Controls

[W A S D] / [Arrow Keys] - Move Frog

Jam Submission

Submission for: Finish the Dang Thing Jam 2021
Theme: N/A
Time Frame: May 23rd - June 10th 2021

The game is "finished" but could also be expanded on.

Developer Notes

Thanks to anyone who took the time to check out this game! I did not have the full time frame that was available to work on this as I was in another jam but with the remaining time I was able to finish this frogger replica like game before the deadline and I'm pretty impressed with how it turned out. The game is "finished" but I could easily create some more levels with a little more time on hand. Perfect jam to get this game wrapped up and the minimal requirements made it easy for a beginner like myself. Thanks again to everyone who participated and played and I would love any kind of feedback in relation to this project!

Update Notes

v2.0 - In Development
